appendix.title: miktex.ini: The &MiKTeX; Configuration File
appendix.para: &MiKTeX; reads configuration settings from the file miktex.ini.

caution.para: It is highly recommended that you edit a local version of miktex.ini when changing configuration settings. See , for more information.

section.title: Example
section.para: Assuming that &localdir;;&installdir; is the list of &TEXMF; root directories, the search path .;%R\tex\plain//;%R\tex\generic//;%R\tex// causes &TeX; to search its input files in the following locations:

listitem.para: In the current directory (.).
In the directory &localdir;\tex\plain and in all folders below it.
In the directory &installdir;\tex\plain and in all folders below it.
In the directory &localdir;\tex\generic and in all folders below it.
In the directory &installdir;\tex\generic and in all folders below it.
In the directory &localdir;\tex and in all folders below it.
In the directory &installdir;\tex and in all folders below it.

section.title: Testing a Search Path
section.para: You can use &findtexmf; to test whether an input file can be found via the configured search path.
